dengu rogin wartha wime pramanaya ihala gos athayi wasangatha roga widya anshaya prakasha karayi.ikuth janawari masaye sita rogin 1245 denaku wartha wi athi bawa da ema anshaya pawasayi.me masa rogin 352k wartha wi athi bawath, rogin 134 denaku lesa wadima rogin pramanayak kolambaa disthrikkayen wartha wi athi bawath wasangatha roga widya anshaya sandahan karayi.dengu rogaya waladima nisa marana 13k siduwa thibe.

namuth polis niladharinge nithi wirodhi ki්raya sambandhawa polis komisama wetha idiripath wana paminili sambandhawa ganu labana ki්raya margayan hi salakiya yuthu wenasak methek wartha wi nomatha, yam niladhariyekuta erehiwa ena paminilla wibhaga kirima sadaha ema niladhariya sewaya karanu polisiye sthanadhipathigen warthawak genwa ganimath ema warthawa matha padanamwa adala wimarshanaya kirima thawamath sidu karana bawath wartha we.
lingika kariye di wuwath kanthawa pirimiyata wada sanwedi prathichara dakwima ithama swabhawikayi.
daruwange andum sari aadiya da ese sakas kara ganimen mudal ithiriya sema wadi alankarayakda labimata haki we.
mewa danna ayata wade rahasak nowe.

“des wides abhiyoga binda” nayakayeki ohu. 2005-2015 kalaya thula me rate siduwu siyalu dushana, wancha, thakkadikam, minimarum gathkala eewa je.aar-premadasa saha chandrika yuga waladi janathawata athwindinna wu pidawanta sapekshawa ‘sulu aparadha’ lesa salakiya yuthu wuwada ee rajayan wetha ‘des wides’ awalada nagune nathi bawa da mathak kala yuthu ya.
eeth mama hadapu sindu tika gana mata sathutuyi.
